name: Fear Protocol: Codename Omega Starring Agent Jack Banger
name_original: Fear Protocol: Codename Omega Starring Agent Jack Banger
description:
It's a nice dark day in Escondido, California and special agent Jack Banger and his superior Gilbert Simpson are planning their next operation. Their life of luxury is soon interrupted however when strange biomonster creatures start appearing all over the city and the ominous Devil Corp is suspected of being the source of the chaos. The Night Striker Squad are sent in to investigate and stop the abominations from taking over the city. Only one question remains...

Who is the traitor?

GENRE
Gripping Avant Garde Survival Shoot-Em-Up

GAME INFO
Control Agent Jack Banger with 3 deadly weapons to defeat the biomonster menace. Use your skills and cunning to solve puzzles and traverse down the HQ.

PROS
 Is Short
 High Octance Action
 Goes Out With a Bang

CONS
 Good Music
 Defies Genre Stereotypes
 Risotto
